channel.title: St2workflowengine- pod is not starting as it is getting terminated after immediate start
channel.description:
Use below kubernetes code
https://github.com/StackStorm/st2-docker/tree/master/runtime
workflow --pod is terminateing and remaing all st2 pods are starting.
kubectl exec -it st2workflowengine-58c5b75d49-sc2vp bash error: unable to upgrade connection: container not found ("st2workflowengine")

item.title: St2workflowengine- pod is not starting as it is getting terminated after immediate start
item.dc:creator: udaymadupathi31
item.description:
Use below kubernetes code

GitHub

StackStorm/st2-docker

Demo all-in-one Docker container for StackStorm. Contribute to StackStorm/st2-docker development by creating an account on GitHub.

workflow --pod is terminateing and remaing all st2 pods are starting.

kubectl exec -it st2workflowengine-58c5b75d49-sc2vp bash
error: unable to upgrade connection: container not found (“st2workflowengine”)
